scripts.cordova-prepare: node scripts/cordova-prepare & cd ./src/cordova & cordova plugin remove cordova-plugin-flc-util & cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-flc-util --searchpath=../../dist/cordova
scripts.cordova-publish: node scripts/cordova-publish & cd ../cordova-plugin-flc-util & git add -A & git commit -m "published from flc-util" & git push
